Reviews.Title: Great little tablet
Reviews.Author: HCTS
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tablet, but the battery life is about two hours and that's it. I bought it for business credit card service as our elderly customers were unable to sign on a smart phone. The screen is sharp and crisp, but it's that darn battery that is the problem,

Reviews.Title: Not a good tablet
Reviews.Author: tony h.
Reviews.Content: The price says it all its very cheap I didn't like it from the moment I started using it so I bought a  better one anyway my kids play with it a little they dropped it not that hard but it just flung open all the wires everything what a joke the battery last a half hour at the most.

Reviews.Title: This is an awful product you should avoid at all costs.
Reviews.Author: Jon Byswinger
Reviews.Content: From the moment I openned the package and turned it on, this tablet has been buggy, slow and crash-prone. Internet browsing was frustrating. Snapchat is non-functional. Apps crash at random.In total, I may have used this tablet two days since owning it-- for over 2 months, now. I became so frustrated with the crashes and slowness that I just stopped using it. I stopped bothering to charge it. Speaking of which....The battery life is ridiculously bad. I can't imagine using this for many media applications beyond casual games like Angry Birds. Forget music or a tv show (I haven't tried loading a show on it--- it's so bad at everything else, I wouldn't want to waste the hours trying to set it up).Bottom line: you get what you pay for. And this is definitely not a product you should pay for.

Reviews.Title: Good for the budget minded
Reviews.Author: timpclimber
Reviews.Content: Well built, easy to up and use if you buy one with a key board case.  Love it church with a scripture and bible dictionary app.  As a teacher allows me to prepare power point presentations and carry to meeting to take notes.  for $60.00 hard to beat.
